name: Super-Spark
author: Anubi
description:
Super-
Spark is a desaturated palette containing 12 colors, inspired by the 
Game Boy Color and Super Game Boy. Each and every one of these colors 
were made to be as versatile as possible, allowing you to mix and match 
between them, and get new color ramps out of these possible 
combinations. (You can see some of these combinations in the example.)
